author: hqucms
body:
Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/28902.

Currently the ParticleNet tagger is not added to the MiniAOD sequence. But we plan to enable it for UL re-MiniAOD.

Needs:
 - DNN model: https://github.com/cms-data/RecoBTag-Combined/pull/26
 - MXNet 1.5: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/5592

We should also integrate https://github.com/cms-data/RecoBTag-Combined/pull/24 together with the update to MXNet 1.5.
title: [10_6_X] MXNet-based implementation of the ParticleNet tagger
